name: The Elf's Lewd Training
description:
In this game, players subject the elf queen Elfin to lewd sexual training.
She can be put in 7 enticing positions, and then be touched all over.
Use 8 different ways of touching and go to town on all her private bits.
Touching her will raise her sensitivity, but let it go up to high and a bolt of lightning will penalize you.
As her sexuality develops due to the training, new poses will become available.
Touching her erogenous zones will raise a variety of stats.
As these stats reach certain values, new ways of training her will be unlocked.
Some modes of training will allow you to insert toys into her body, among other things.
With enough training and enough pleasure, you can coax the ultimate secret of the elves out of her.
At the end of the main portion of the game the elf's room will be unlocked. This is yet another fun way to pass the time.
